column5: Gonna surprise her Xmas morning and put a big bow on it. Used some cash I had saved and $ 1500 I got for Jack's Mini Z. He graduated to the Bravo 250 and left my wife sledless, same model as in the picture 2018 Tundra Sport but getting her the 600 ACE 4 stroke, removable 2 up backrest with heated grips and the extra tall windshield.
Awesome machine!  Perfect for lake and bush cruisin!  Those 600 ACE motors are ridiculously fuel efficient from what I've read.
You are going to be the recipient of a massive smile on 25th.
yeah, really nice little machine, hope she likes it, if not oh well....i'll take it for a spin or two(thousand).
Better get more than a smile there Santa. Nice ride.
